verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G3048>collection<s%> for the <S%G40>saints,<s%> as I <S%G1299>directed<s%> the <S%G1577>churches<s%> of <S%G1053>Galatia,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> you <S%G2532>also.<s%>

On the <S%G1520>first<s%> day of <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G4521>week<s%> let <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1538>one<s%> of you <S%G5087>put<s%> <S%G3844>aside<s%> <S%G1438><s%> and <S%G2343>save,<s%> as he may <S%G2137>prosper,<s%> that <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G3048>collections<s%> be <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> I <S%G2064>come.<s%>

And <S%G3752>when<s%> I <S%G3854>arrive,<s%> <S%G3739>whomever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> you may <S%G1381>approve,<s%> I shall <S%G3992>send<s%> them with <S%G1992>letters<s%> to <S%G667>carry<s%> your <S%G5485>gift<s%> to <S%G2419>Jerusalem;<s%>
and <S%G1437>if<s%> it is <S%G514>fitting<s%> for me to <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> they will <S%G4198>go<s%> with me.
But I shall <S%G2064>come<s%> to you <S%G3752>after<s%> I <S%G1330>go<s%> <S%G1330>through<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia,<s%> for I am <S%G1330>going<s%> <S%G1330>through<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia;<s%>

and <S%G5177>perhaps<s%> I shall <S%G2650>stay<s%> with you, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3914>spend<s%> the <S%G3914>winter,<s%> that you may <S%G4311>send<s%> me on my <S%G4311>way<s%> <S%G3757>wherever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> I may <S%G4198>go.<s%>

For I do not <S%G2309>wish<s%> to <S%G3708>see<s%> you <S%G737>now<s%> [just] in <S%G3938>passing;<s%> for I <S%G1679>hope<s%> to <S%G1961>remain<s%> with you for <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G5550>time,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2010>permits.<s%>
But I shall <S%G1961>remain<s%> in <S%G2181>Ephesus<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G4005>Pentecost;<s%>
for a <S%G3173>wide<s%> <S%G2374>door<s%> for <S%G1756>effective<s%> [service] has <S%G455>opened<s%> to me, and there are <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G480>adversaries.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> <S%G2064>comes,<s%> <S%G991>see<s%> that he is with you <S%G870>without<s%> <S%G870>cause<s%> to be <S%G870>afraid;<s%> for he is <S%G2038>doing<s%> the Lord's <S%G2041>work,<s%> as I <S%G2532>also<s%> am.

Let <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1848>despise<s%> him. But <S%G4311>send<s%> him on his <S%G4311>way<s%> in <S%G1515>peace,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that he may <S%G2064>come<s%> to me; for I <S%G1551>expect<s%> him with the <S%G80>brethren.<s%>

But <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G625>Apollos<s%> our <S%G80>brother,<s%> I <S%G3870>encouraged<s%> him <S%G4183>greatly<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> to you with the <S%G80>brethren;<s%> and it was not at <S%G3843>all<s%> [his] <S%G2307>desire<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3568>now,<s%> but he will <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> he has <S%G2119>opportunity.<s%>
Be on the <S%G1127>alert,<s%> <S%G4739>stand<s%> <S%G4739>firm<s%> in the <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G407>act<s%> <S%G407>like<s%> <S%G407>men,<s%> be <S%G2901>strong.<s%>
Let <S%G3956>all<s%> that you do be <S%G1096>done<s%> in <S%G26>love.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> I <S%G3870>urge<s%> you, <S%G80>brethren<s%> (you <S%G3609>know<s%> the <S%G3614>household<s%> of <S%G4734>Stephanas,<s%> that they were the <S%G536>first<s%> <S%G536>fruits<s%> of <S%G882>Achaia,<s%> and that they have <S%G5021>devoted<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> for <S%G1248>ministry<s%> to the <S%G40>saints<s%>),
that you <S%G2532>also<s%> be in <S%G5293>subjection<s%> to <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G5108>men<s%> and to <S%G3956>everyone<s%> who <S%G4903>helps<s%> in the <S%G4903>work<s%> and <S%G2872>labors.<s%>

And I <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> the <S%G3952>coming<s%> of <S%G4734>Stephanas<s%> and <S%G5415>Fortunatus<s%> and <S%G883>Achaicus;<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they have <S%G378>supplied<s%> <S%G5303>what<s%> was <S%G5303>lacking<s%> on your part.
For they have <S%G373>refreshed<s%> my <S%G4151>spirit<s%> and <S%G4771>yours.<s%> <S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G1921>acknowledge<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G5108>men.<s%>

The <S%G1577>churches<s%> of <S%G773>Asia<s%> <S%G782>greet<s%> you. <S%G207>Aquila<s%> and <S%G4251>Prisca<s%> <S%G782>greet<s%> you <S%G4183>heartily<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> with the <S%G1577>church<s%> that is in their <S%G3624>house.<s%>
<S%G3956>All<s%> the <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G782>greet<s%> you. <S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another<s%> with a <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G5370>kiss.<s%>
The <S%G783>greeting<s%> is in my <S%G1699>own<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> â€“ <S%G3972>Paul.<s%>
<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> does not <S%G5368>love<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> let him be <S%G331>accursed.<s%> <S%G3134>Maranatha.<s%>
The <S%G5485>grace<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> be with you.
My <S%G26>love<s%> be with you <S%G3956>all<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
